Articles.Content:
Afternoon all,

I have got a bit of an issue with one of my craft that I have created (or rather copied). I am trying to do a real space progression with real parts etc, however, I have installed realism overhaul and it's great but I am struggling with the locked throttle with the Vostok space craft, I have had to bring fuel all the way down to practically zero and even then it's still too much, the engines are also completely overpowered and i'm reaching an AP of 80km in a matter of seconds.

 

I have already tried to bring down the throttle limiter to, again, around zero but it's still way too powerful.

If anyone else uses this mod please advise me on two things, 1)is there a way of disabling this aspect of the mod, and 2) if not on the previous, how can I slow down the engines so I am not blasting into space within seconds.

 

Thanks,

Joe.
